item.title: Three Americans killed by IS gunman in Syria, US military says
item.description: Two US soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed in the attack, according to the US Central Command.

item.title: Shock and grief after director Rob Reiner and wife Michele found dead
item.description: He directed classic films including The Princess Bride, This is Spinal Tap and When Harry Met Sally.

item.title: Smooth end to Messi India tour after Kolkata chaos
item.description: Messi's India tour had a chaotic start after angry fans in Kolkata damaged a stadium after failing to catch a glimpse of him.

item.title: A 10-year-old, two rabbis and a Holocaust survivor - Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
item.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

item.title: Fear of crime and migration fuels Chile's swing to the right
item.description: Chile has become the latest country in the region to elect a right-wing president.
